Title: The Rabbitsfoot
Description:
The Broketooth hozen stole our Rabbitsfoot! He was the grummle with the biggest luckydo.

This is very bad fortune indeed. Please, $r, we need our Rabbitsfoot back. We need his good fortune back.

Can you search the Broketooth Outpost for him?
ObjectivesText: Rescue Brother Rabbitsfoot from the Broketooth Outpost.
RewardText:
Look what Broketooths and Knucklethumps did to grummle waystation. Hardly a luckydo to be found.

Grummles had a deal with the hozen. We give them food, and they don't ravage. Whenever they think to ravage, Shado-Pan remind them not to ravage.

But all of Shado-Pan are away defending the wall now. And the hozen want more food than the grummles have.
